description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林彪和叶群之女。
description.en: Chinese political figure, daughter of Lin Biao and Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，林立衡的父亲。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, father of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，林立衡的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Lin Biao, mother of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交家。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 指1971年9月13日，林彪、叶群等人乘坐的飞机在蒙古温都尔汗坠毁，机上人员全部遇难的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event on September 13, 1971, when the plane carrying Lin Biao, Ye Qun, and others crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia, killing everyone on board.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古地名，九一三事件发生地。
description.en: A place in Mongolia where the September 13 Incident occurred.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡的丈夫。
description.en: Husband of Lin Liheng.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是林彪的女儿。
description.en: Lin Liheng is the daughter of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是叶群的女儿。
description.en: Lin Liheng is the daughter of Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡于1944年8月31日出生于延安。
description.en: Lin Liheng was born in Yan'an on August 31, 1944.

description.zh-cn: 1962年进入清华大学电子工程系就读。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Electronic Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 从清华大学转学至北京大学中文系。
description.en: Transferred from Tsinghua University to the Department of Chinese at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 在清华大学就读时，林立衡与刘少奇的女儿是室友。
description.en: While studying at Tsinghua University, Lin Liheng was a roommate of Liu Shaoqi's daughter.

description.zh-cn: 在清华大学就读时，林立衡与姬鹏飞的女儿是室友。
description.en: While studying at Tsinghua University, Lin Liheng was a roommate of Ji Pengfei's daughter.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间担任《空军报》副总编。
description.en: Served as Deputy Editor-in-Chief of the Air Force News during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中因飞机坠毁而身亡。
description.en: Lin Biao was killed in the September 13 Incident due to a plane crash.

description.zh-cn: 叶群在九一三事件中因飞机坠毁而身亡。
description.en: Ye Qun was killed in the September 13 Incident due to a plane crash.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件后，林立衡虽然告发有功，但仍需接受审查，期间曾试图自杀。
description.en: After the September 13 Incident, although Lin Liheng reported the escape plan, she was still subjected to investigation, during which she attempted suicide.

description.zh-cn: 在林立衡写信求助后，毛泽东于1974年7月31日批示解除了对她的审查。
description.en: After Lin Liheng wrote a letter asking for help, Mao Zedong issued an instruction on July 31, 1974, to lift the investigation against her.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡与张清林结婚。
description.en: Lin Liheng married Zhang Qinglin.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡曾在位于郑州的汽车厂工作后，调至中国社会科学院工作。
description.en: After working in a car factory in Zhengzhou, Lin Liheng was transferred to work at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 1989年，林立衡参与发起“中国现代文化学会”。
description.en: In 1989, Lin Liheng participated in initiating the 'China Modern Culture Society'.

description.zh-cn: 林彪一行人乘坐的飞机在温都尔汗坠毁。
description.en: The plane carrying Lin Biao and his party crashed in Öndörkhaan.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡六岁时曾跟随父亲林彪至莫斯科养病。
description.en: At the age of six, Lin Liheng followed her father Lin Biao to Moscow for medical treatment.

description.zh-cn: 与张清林结婚后，林立衡曾在郑州的一家汽车厂工作。
description.en: After marrying Zhang Qinglin, Lin Liheng worked at a car factory in Zhengzhou.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡担任《林彪军事文选》的主编之一。
description.en: Lin Liheng served as one of the chief editors of 'Selected Military Works of Lin Biao'.
